description.h2: Elements with a type attribute having the local name 'domainItemType' in a standard taxonomy schema namespace, or a type derived by restriction from it, must not appear as facts in an instance.
description.p: Elements of this type are for use only in the xbrldi:explicitMember element.

variation.name: 6.5.25 DementedDomain concept is nonnum:domainItemType but not used as fact, GOOD.
variation.description: DementedDomain concept is nonnum:domainItemType but not used as fact, GOOD.

variation.name: 6.5.25 AbcMember, a non-abstract nonnum:domainItemType, used as empty valued fact, NOGOOD.
variation.description: AbcMember, a non-abstract nonnum:domainItemType, used as empty valued fact, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.5.25 Concept DoesNotLookLikeButIsDomainMember with type derived from nonnum:domainItemType used in a fact, NOGOOD.
variation.description: Concept DoesNotLookLikeButIsDomainMember with type derived from nonnum:domainItemType used in a fact, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.5.25 edgar:LooksLikeButIsNotDomainMemberHaHa concept derived from string, used as fact, GOOD.
variation.description: edgar:LooksLikeButIsNotDomainMemberHaHa concept derived from string, used as fact, GOOD.

variation.name: 6.5.25 edgar:LooksLikeButIsNotDomainMemberHaHa concept derived from string, used as fact, GOOD.
variation.description: edgar:LooksLikeButIsNotDomainMemberHaHa concept derived from string, used as fact, GOOD.

variation.name: 6.5.25 edgar:DomainMember non-abstract concept (type us-types:domainItemType) used as fact, NOGOOD.
variation.description: edgar:DomainMember non-abstract concept (type us-types:domainItemType) used as fact, NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.5.25 edgar:DerivedDomainMember non-abstract concept (type us-types:domainItemType) used as fact, NOGOOD.
variation.description: edgar:DerivedDomainMember concept (type us-types:domainItemType) used as fact, NOGOOD.
